entry.title: OnePlus X H2os 2.0 install Gapp
entry.content: 在 氢OS2.0版 基础上安装谷歌应用。 流程 安装 氢OS 2.0版(不重启) 双清 进入fastboot模式， 刷入twrp recovery(3.0.3-onyx) 进入twrp recovery, 刷入open gapp(arm6.0, nano) 重启 清楚Google paly应用缓存 Command12345678910111213> adb devices> adb reboot bootloader-----------------------------------------------> fastboot devices> fastboot oem unlock-----------------------------------------------> adb reboot bootloader> fastboot flash recovery twrp.img> fastboot boot twrp.img LinkOnePlusH2OS_14_OTA_001_all_201610291136_98e9299fced2483e.zip:[Download]OnePlus X officail recovery:[Download Oxygen Recovey (Optional)]twrp-3.0.3-0-onyx.img:[Download] [OK H2os 2.0 安装Gapp][不双清给一加氢 OS 刷上 Google Apps]

entry.title: ShadowsocksR/SSR
entry.content: Software Link breakwa11/shadowsocks-rss teddysun/shadowsocks_install ShadowsocksR shadowsocksr-android shadowsocksr-csharp 购买VPS服务器 测试速度 支付方式 用途（SSH, WEB-SERVER …) 部署服务器（搭建 SS）使用 putty 远程登陆服务器 putty 使用方法 install123# wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocksR.sh# chmod +x shadowsocksR.sh# ./shadowsocksR.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocksR.log OK info12345678910Congratulations, ShadowsocksR server install completed!Your Server IP :your_server_ipYour Server Port :your_server_portYour Password :your_passwordYour Protocol :your_protocolYour obfs :your_obfsYour Encryption Method:your_encryption_methodWelcome to visit:https://shadowsocks.be/9.htmlEnjoy it! uninstall1# ./shadowsocksR.sh uninstall check status1# /etc/init.d/shadowsocks status use command启动：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks start停止：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks stop重启：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks restart状态：/etc/init.d/shadowsocks status 配置文件路径：/etc/shadowsocks.json日志文件路径：/var/log/shadowsocks.log代码安装目录：/usr/local/shadowsocks 多用户配置示例123456789101112131415161718192021{"server":"0.0.0.0","server_ipv6": "[::]","local_address":"127.0.0.1","local_port":1080,"port_password":{ "8989":"password1", "8990":"password2"， "8991":"password3"},"timeout":300,"method":"aes-256-cfb","protocol": "origin","protocol_param": "","obfs": "plain","obfs_param": "","redirect": "","dns_ipv6": false,"fast_open": false,"workers": 1} SS 客户端设置… VPS conoha.jp zh HostUS VULTR RECTIFIED.NET ChangeiP DigitalOcean VIRMACH BandwagonHOST | 泥瓦工 Tutorial 分享一下搭建SS教程 ShadowsocksR一键安装脚本 从VPS到搭建私人SS服务器全过程 科学上网讨论与分享 ss免费账号 自建ss服务器教程 Other Link G+ 讨论组

entry.title: Markdown
entry.content: Site - Link 创始人 John Gruber 的 Markdown 语法说明 Mastering Markdown Markdown 中文版语法说明 在线编辑器 MaHua Syntax guidesPARAGRAPHS AND LINE BREAKS | 段落和换行1段落只是一个或多个连续的文本行，由一个或多个空白行分隔。（空白行是任何看起来像空白行的行 - 只包含空格或制表符的行除外）。正常段落不应缩进空格或制表符。 段落只是一个或多个连续的文本行，由一个或多个空白行分隔。（空白行是任何看起来像空白行的行 - 只包含空格或制表符的行除外）。正常段落不应缩进空格或制表符。 1当你不想要插入<br />使用降价标签休息，你最终有两个或多个空格行，然后键入回报。 是的，这需要更多的努力创建一个，但一个简单的“每一个换行是一个”规则将不适用于Markdown。 当您使用硬休息格式化时，Markdown的电子邮件风格的块引用和多段列表项目工作效果最好 - 看起来更好。 HEADERS123# This is an <h1> tag## This is an <h2> tag###### This is an <h6> tag BLOCKQUOUTES | 引用文字1> ... LISTS123456789101112131415* ...* ...* ...OR+ ...+ ...+ ...OR- ...- ...- ...OR1. ...2. ...3. ... CODE BLOCK simply indent every line of the block by at least 4 spaces or 1 tab or123\`\`\`...\`\`\` TABLE12345678910First Header | Second Header------------ | -------------Content from cell 1 | Content from cell 2Content in the first column | Content in the second columnor| Tables | Are | Cool || ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|| col 3 is | right-aligned | $1600 || col 2 is | centered | $12 || zebra stripes | are neat | $1 | HORIZONTAL RULES | 水平规则 |123456789* * *********- - ---------------------------------------- LINKS1[an example](http://example.com/ "Title") EMPHASIS | 强调1234567*single asterisks*_single underscores_**double asterisks**__double underscores__ CODE1Use the `printf()` function. IMAGES123![Alt text](/path/to/img.jpg)![Alt text](/path/to/img.jpg "Optional title")

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
